SELECT CRCLM_CD, CRCLM_YEAR, CRCLM_HALF, CRCLM_NM, SBJCT_NO, SBJCT_NM, ESNTL_YN, cls_stdntNum, cls_dayhour, ROOM_NM FROM atndSbjctListView WHERE CRCLM_YEAR = #{crclm_year } AND CRCLM_HALF = #{crclm_half } AND INSTR_NO = #{id }
AND CRCLM_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchCrclm },'%')
AND SBJCT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchSbjct },'%')
AND KORN_FLNM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchInstr },'%')

SELECT CRCLM_CD, CRCLM_YEAR, CRCLM_HALF, SBJCT_NO, (SELECT INSERT(INSERT(LECT_YMD,5,0,'-'),8,0,'-')) AS LECT_YMD, LECT_DAY_KORN, CLS_KORN, CONCAT(WEEK_NUM, '주차') AS WEEK_NUM, CONCAT(ATND_SUM, ' / ', ABSC_SUM) AS ATND_SUM FROM atndInstrWeekView WHERE CRCLM_CD = #{crclm_cd } AND CRCLM_YEAR = #{crclm_year } AND CRCLM_HALF = #{crclm_half } AND SBJCT_NO = #{sbjct_no } ORDER BY LECT_YMD, CLS_KORN

SELECT STDNT_NO, (SELECT KORN_FLNM FROM APPL_INFO Ai WHERE APPL_ATND.STDNT_NO = Ai.STDNT_NO) AS STDNT_NM, CodeFind('0014', ATND_CD) AS ATND_STT FROM APPL_ATND WHERE CRCLM_CD = #{crclm_cd } AND CRCLM_YEAR = #{crclm_year } AND CRCLM_HALF = #{crclm_half } AND SBJCT_NO = #{sbjct_no } GROUP BY STDNT_NO ORDER BY STDNT_NM
